item.name: Remap Left Control to Hyper
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps Left Control to Control + Shift + Option + Command.

item.name: Shifts to Parentheses
item.appendix: Shifts, when pressed alone, type parentheses. When used with other keys they're normal shifts.
